name: 115-offline-download-assistant
description: 快速将磁力链接和选中文字发送到115网盘进行离线下载

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp -R *.js manifest.json dist/ && (cp -R *.html dist/ 2>/dev/null || true) && (cp -R icons dist/ 2>/dev/null || true)
scripts.release: gh release create v$npm_package_version artifacts/115-offline-download-assistant-*.zip --title 'Release v$npm_package_version' --notes 'Automated release of version $npm_package_version'

author: Your Name
